articles.author: Daniel Ostanek
articles.title: Jonas Vingegaard and Mathieu van der Poel take wins in first of the post-Tour de France criteriums - Cyclingnews
articles.description: Traditional post-Tour festivities kick off with events in Boxmeer and Aalst with Ciccone, Philipsen, Poels also taking part
articles.content:
It's the week after the Tour de France and the attention of the racing world has quickly turned to the second edition of the Tour de France Femmes.
However, the stars of the men's peloton are still … [+2431 chars]
